alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 21 at 10:51AM MDT until May 23 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Idaho... East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet affecting Sun Valley Region and Wood River Foothills zones. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 East Fork Big Wood River Gimlet 7.9 7.5 Sun 10 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-075-222100- /O.CON.KPIH.FL.A.0005.000000T0000Z-230523T2142Z/ /EFGI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/ 1051 AM MDT Sun May 21 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.4 feet, Near bankfull from near Triumph down-river to the confluence of the Big Wood River with pockets of low-land flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.9 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
